org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.io
Class AeBPWSUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.io.AeBPWSUtil
public class AeBPWSUtil
extends java.lang.Object

A Util class that has some convenience methods for working with the def layer for BPEl4WS 1.1. TODO this class can probably go away (with its functionality moving to the BPEL4WS 1.1 reader visitor) once bpep has been updated to use 2.0 compatible visual models

Constructor Summary
AeBPWSUtil()

static void addSourceToActivity(AeSourceDef aSourceDef, AeActivityDef aActivityDef)
          Adds the source def to the given activity.
static void addTargetToActivity(AeTargetDef aTargetDef, AeActivityDef aActivityDef)
          Adds the target def to the given activity.
static void setJoinConditionOnActivity(java.lang.String aJoinCondition, java.lang.String aJoinConditionLang, AeActivityDef aActivityDef)
          Sets the join condition on the activity by first finding/creating the targets container, then finding/creating the join condition def, then setting the expression on the join condition def.
